subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
We are a U.S Base Investment Company offering Corporate and Personal Investment Funding at a 2~7% ROI for a duration of   10 Years. Kindly have our membership card at 25 dollars only and also sign our Agreement / MOU Clearance you will be   guaranteed to have a non collateral loan of 100  to 10million dollars with credit union loan investment company, we  
also offer 1%  to individuals who introduce  project owners for finance or other opportunities.
Please get back to me if you are interested in more details.
Yours faithfully,
John Henry Markson
Investment Analyst
Email:  
a.john@servicecdu.com

subject: Re:   Hello,
body:
Hello John Henry Markson,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this investment opportunity. I'm always interested in learning more about potential investments. Could you please provide me with some additional details about your company and the types of investments you offer? How long has your company been in operation, and what is your track record?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the terms and conditions of the membership card and the Agreement MOU Clearance. Could you explain how these work and what benefits they provide?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Benjamin

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Good Day Ben



I am  John Henry Markson, , Personal Assistant (PA) to Miss Isabela  Dos
Santos,
the First Daughter of Angola's former President Jos√© Eduardo dos Santos
An Investor.  Right now the Daughter is looking for a
 reliable company that will need a loan of $2.5 Billion  for an investment,
into a  company
 that needs funds  for expansion only.


she can not invest the money
 to new Companies that want to start up but into Companies that
have been making good profits but need funds for EXPANSION. Unless the
company will accept a smaller amount if your company is new.


His Area of concentrations are Real Estate, Biotech,Textiles ,
Information technology, Pharmaceuticals , Oil & Energy
Industries, Mining &Metals Industry, Management Consulting
Industry ,Maritime industry, Hospital & Health Care Industry,
Consumer Services Industry, International Trade and Development
Industry ,Gambling & Casinos Industry, Electrical/Electronic
Manufacturing Industry, Insurance Industry, Chemical industries,
Marketing and Advertising Industry, Leisure, Travel & Tourism
Industry, Agriculture, Aviation, Retail, Import and Export, Trade
and development industry, Real Estate & Construction Industry and
any other viable investment opportunities just like yours.




If you recommend a Company to take loan or investment funds
from my client the investor, me and you will be entitled to 5% of
  any amount received by the Company from the investor but if you
are taking the fund directly as a company i will be entitled to
  2.5% and you will retain 2.5% as Global Finder's fee commission.
There will be a face to face meeting between the investor and the
investee after signing (MOU) the (AORI) should not be less than
 2% per annum, duration of payment is 10 to 15years.

Look for a reliable Company that need funding and we can easily
 make 5% of the amount received from the investor but we need to
 maintain absolute confidentiality in the transaction as the fund
provider want to remain silent, so you have to keep it highly
confidential between us.


I will need the company profile and the project summary of the
company that will need funding to present to my investor.


I am looking  forward to hear from you.



Sincerely
John Henry Markson,

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Good day John Henry Markson,

Thank you for reaching out with this opportunity. I'm interested in learning more about the potential investment and loan options available through your client, Miss Isabela Dos Santos. Could you provide more details on the terms and conditions of the funding, as well as any specific requirements or criteria that companies need to meet in order to be considered for this opportunity?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Benjamin

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Mr Ben,
Before we proceed, I will required your full details and a valid
Identification
finally, you must provide your investment plan schedule
and the exact amount that will complete the project .

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Mr. Ben,

Thank you for reaching out. Could you please provide more details about the project and investment plan schedule? I would like to understand the scope of the project before proceeding further.

Best wishes,
Benjamin
